const journalISSNs = [

    "1476-4679","1755-4349","2522-5839","2522-5812","1750-2799","2056-676X",
    "2662-8449","1521-0081","1521-0103","1553-7374","2470-9468","1362-4962",
    "1474-760X","1471-0064","1367-4811","1520-5126","1549-9626","1549-960X",
    "2662-8457","1546-1696","1546-1718","1471-0080","1474-1776","1473-3099",

    "2150-7511","1098-660X","1471-2180","2052-4463","2049-2618","2468-2667",
    "1474-4465","1470-2045","2215-0366","2352-4642","2213-8587","2468-1253",
    "2352-3026","2352-3018","1098-5514","1469-0691","1545-861X","1471-2334",
    "1471-2458","2047-2994","1468-3288","1949-0984","1528-0012","1751-7370",
    "1532-2742","2397-3374","2662-1355","1474-547X","1473-3099","1470-2045",
    "1474-4457","2213-8587","2213-2619","2214-109X","2215-0366","2468-2667",
    "2468-1253","2542-5196","2352-3026","2352-3018","2352-3964","2590-3330",
    "2666-6065","2666-5220","2666-7762","2666-7568","1538-3598","2168-6149",
    "2168-6203","2168-6211","2168-622X","2168-6181","2168-6262",
    "2574-3805","2168-6238"
];


// Sanitize user input to escape special characters that could interfere with PubMed query syntax
function sanitizeInput(input) {
    // Escape special characters: quotes, parentheses, brackets
    return input.replace(/["\[\]()]/g, ' ').trim();
}

// Build PubMed URL from pathogen, topic, and author inputs
function generatePubMedUrl(pathogen, topic, author) {
    const sanitizedPathogen = sanitizeInput(pathogen);
    const sanitizedTopic = topic ? sanitizeInput(topic) : '';
    const sanitizedAuthor = author ? sanitizeInput(author) : '';
    
    // Build the search term
    let searchTerm = `("${sanitizedPathogen}"[tiab])`;
    if (sanitizedTopic) {
        searchTerm = `("${sanitizedPathogen}"[tiab] AND "${sanitizedTopic}"[tiab])`;
    }
    
    // Add author filter if provided
    // Author comes from predefined dropdown with pre-formatted PubMed syntax (e.g., "Author Name"[au])
    // No sanitization needed since values are hardcoded in the dropdown, not user input
    if (author) {
        searchTerm = `${searchTerm} AND ${author}`;
    }
    
    // Build journal filter
    const journalFilter = journalISSNs.map(issn => `"${issn}"[ta]`).join(' OR ');
    
    // Combine into full query
    const fullQuery = `${searchTerm} AND (${journalFilter})`;
    
    // Build and return the URL
    const encodedQuery = encodeURIComponent(fullQuery);
    return `https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/?term=${encodedQuery}&sort=date&size=200`;
}

// Show the generated URL in preview section
function showUrlPreview(url) {
    document.getElementById('url-preview').style.display = 'block';
    document.getElementById('generated-url').textContent = url;
}

function buildPubMedUrl() {
    const pathogen = document.getElementById('pathogen-input').value.trim();
    const topic = document.getElementById('topic-input').value.trim();
    const author = document.getElementById('author-select').value;
    
    if (!pathogen) {
        showFeedback('Please enter a topic.', 'warning');
        return null;
    }
    
    const url = generatePubMedUrl(pathogen, topic, author);
    showUrlPreview(url);
    
    // Open in new tab
    window.open(url, '_blank');
    showFeedback('Search opened in a new tab!', 'success');
    
    return url;
}

function copyPubMedUrl() {
    const pathogen = document.getElementById('pathogen-input').value.trim();
    const topic = document.getElementById('topic-input').value.trim();
    const author = document.getElementById('author-select').value;
    
    if (!pathogen) {
        showFeedback('Please enter a pathogen name first.', 'warning');
        return;
    }
    
    const url = generatePubMedUrl(pathogen, topic, author);
    showUrlPreview(url);
    
    // Check for clipboard API availability and copy to clipboard
    if (navigator.clipboard && window.isSecureContext) {
        navigator.clipboard.writeText(url).then(() => {
            showFeedback('URL copied to clipboard!', 'success');
        }).catch(() => {
            showFeedback('Failed to copy URL. Please copy it manually from the preview below.', 'warning');
        });
    } else {
        // Fallback for non-secure contexts (HTTP)
        showFeedback('Clipboard not available. Please copy the URL manually from the preview below.', 'warning');
    }
}

function clearInputs() {
    document.getElementById('pathogen-input').value = '';
    document.getElementById('topic-input').value = '';
    document.getElementById('author-select').value = '';
    document.getElementById('url-preview').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('feedback-message').style.display = 'none';
}

function showFeedback(message, type) {
    const feedbackEl = document.getElementById('feedback-message');
    feedbackEl.textContent = message;
    feedbackEl.style.display = 'block';
    
    if (type === 'success') {
        feedbackEl.style.background = '#d4edda';
        feedbackEl.style.color = '#155724';
        feedbackEl.style.border = '1px solid #c3e6cb';
    } else if (type === 'warning') {
        feedbackEl.style.background = '#fff3cd';
        feedbackEl.style.color = '#856404';
        feedbackEl.style.border = '1px solid #ffeeba';
    }
    
    // Auto-hide after 4 seconds
    setTimeout(() => {
        feedbackEl.style.display = 'none';
    }, 4000);
}

// Allow Enter key to trigger search
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const inputs = document.querySelectorAll('#pathogen-input, #topic-input');
    inputs.forEach(input => {
        input.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
            if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                buildPubMedUrl();
            }
        });
    });
});
</script>
